name: Do U Copy? - Private Beta (Oculus Quest)
name_original: Do U Copy? - Private Beta (Oculus Quest)
description:
[PRIVATE BETA - spots are limited - this page is for Quest headsets only]

This app requires sideloading. Learn how to Sideload in 5 min here : https://sidequestvr.com/setup-howto

Do U Copy? (DUC?) is an VR co-op party game. DUC? puts players in unique and immersive situations where communication is key to win! In the first volume : Do U Copy? Vol.1, you’ll be immersed in a « not-so-typical » bank heist. Choose to play as the Thief (VR) or the Hacker (PC/Mobile) and cooperate with your ally to get the prized money! 

Do U Copy? is a VR co-op game for friends, family and couples who  wants to put their communication skills to the test.

In Do U Copy?  play as the Thief and make your way through one of the (least) secured banks in the country. Avoid traps, guards and camera using your VR legs and the guidance of your « guy-in-the-chair ».

Or play as the Hacker, become the eyes and ears of the operations through your phone, tablet or laptop!

Using your (un)realistic skills, hack through the bank securities, guide your ally and solve engaging puzzles with unexpected turns !

Do U Copy is currently supported across these platforms : 

VR 

- Oculus Quest / Quest 2 (this page)

-Oculus Rift / Rift S / Quest with Link

- SteamVR headsets

Flat (Hacker App) 
(Download it here -->  www.fugamestudio.com/download-the-app)

- Android devices (.apk)

- iOS devices

- PC (Windows)

Need more details ? Join the Discord (bit.ly/joinDUC)
Have fun! 
www.fugamestudio.com
